holisticai.utils.normalize_tensor¶

holisticai.utils.normalize_tensor(tensor)¶

Formatting helper function - normalises a tensor to [0,1] range

Description

Given a numpy ndarray, we return a normalised array so that all values are in [0,1] range

Parameters

tensornumpy ndarray

a numpy ndarray

Returns

numpy ndarray

Normalised tensor
